pages.text: $(li)The Thrasher Tooth is an item that can be used to make $(l:patchouli:decoration/others/trapdoors)Trapdoors$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/others/doors)Doors$(/l), decoration blocks, a $(l:patchouli:decoration/charm/lanterns)Lantern$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l) and a $(l:patchouli:weapons/trident)Trident$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/upgrade_aquatic/thrasher)Thrashers$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
